document_title: The Care and Support (Charging and Assessment of Resources) Regulations 2014

duties.duty_description: Provide certain services free of charge (community equipment, intermediate care, reablement support)
Provide services free of charge to adults with variant Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease
Ensure charges for arrangements do not exceed costs incurred
Ensure personal expenses allowance for care home residents
Guarantee minimum income for adults and carers not in care homes
